item.description: I am a Cloud Architect by profession ğŸ‘¨ğŸ»â€ğŸ’», and my alter ego is that of a Developer ğŸ¤·ğŸ½ I am a hobbyist software developer and a tinkerer. For a brief period, I was in the academiaâ€”at the Middlesex University, Londonâ€”doing research, from where I obtained a BSc. in Computer Science (2008) and a PhD in Artificial Intelligence & Computational Linguistics (2011). In 2013, I founded the tech team at Zerodha, now India’s largest stock broker, where I have been the CTO ever since.
